==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ひん|こく}}
{{IPAchar|/pinkoku/}} → {{IPAchar|/finkoku/}} → {{IPAchar|/hinkoku/}}

From {{der|ltc|ja|sort=ひんこく|-}} compound {{m|zh|稟告|tr=pim<sup>X</sup> kowk|lit=report, petition + inform}}. Compare modern {{cog|nan|-}} reading ''pín-kò'' or {{cog|cmn|-}} ''bǐnggào''.

The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely the original borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|ひんこく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひんこく}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ひんこく|rare|possibly|_|obsolete}} {{l|en|reporting}} {{qualifier|especially to a superior}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=ひんこく|rare|possibly|_|obsolete}} a {{l|en|report}} {{qualifier|especially to a superior}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|上申|じょうしん}}
* {{ja-r|報告|ほうこく}} {{qualifier|lacks the “to a superior” sense}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|ひんこく}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ひんこく|rare|possibly|_|obsolete}} to {{l|en|report}}, to {{l|en|make}} a {{l|en|report}} {{qualifier|especially to a superior}}

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|ひんこく}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|上申|じょうしん}}
* {{ja-r|報告|ほうこく}} {{qualifier|lacks the “to a superior” sense}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|りん|こく}}

Appears to be a shift in pronunciation within Japanese, likely influenced by the alternative {{der|ltc|ja|sort=りんこく|-}} reading ''lim<sup>X</sup>'' for the {{m|zh|稟}} character. The ''rin'' reading in Japanese is sometimes treated as [[慣用音#Japanese|kan'yōon]].<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|りんこく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|りんこく}}

# a {{l|en|proposal}}, {{l|en|proposing}}
# {{l|en|notification}}, {{l|en|notifying}}, {{l|en|informing}}, {{l|en|telling}}
# a {{l|en|declaration}}, {{l|en|declaring}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|proposal}} {{ja-r|申し出|もうしで}}, {{ja-r|提案|ていあん}}
* {{sense|notification}} {{ja-r|通知|つうち}}, {{ja-r|告知|こくち}}
* {{sense|declaration}} {{ja-r|申し告げる|もうしつげる}}, {{ja-r|申告|しんこく}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|りんこく}}

# to {{l|en|propose}}, to {{l|en|make}} a {{l|en|proposal}}
# to {{l|en|notify}}, to {{l|en|inform}}, to {{l|en|tell}}
# to {{l|en|declare}}, to {{l|en|make}} a {{l|en|declaration}}

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|りんこく}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|propose}} {{ja-r|申し出る|もうしでる}}, {{ja-r|提案|ていあん}}
* {{sense|inform}} {{ja-r|申し上げる|もうしあげる}}
* {{sense|notify}} {{ja-r|通知|つうち}}, {{ja-r|告知|こくち}}
